main event: A sighting of a white object the size of a walnut occurred on 27 December 1957 in Ballinger, Texas.
interesting points: The object was described as having an intense white color with no sound., The object reportedly gained altitude before disappearing., The sighting lasted for approximately 1.5 minutes., The conclusion suggested it was probably a balloon or possibly an aircraft with insufficient data for a definitive conclusion., The sighting occurred during clear sky conditions and good visibility.
sighted object: one object size of walnut, color intense white
